mapper.insert: insert into client_table(c_id, c_password, c_name, c_nickname, c_email, c_photoname) values(#{c_id}, #{c_password}, #{c_name}, #{c_nickname}, #{c_email}, #{c_photoname})
mapper.update: update client_table set c_password = #{c_password}, c_nickname = #{c_nickname}, c_email = #{c_email} where c_number = #{c_number}
